Welcome to the Treasure Hunt Adventure!

 Follow these rules to find the treasures:

 1. Enable location services on your device

 2. Read each clue carefully and think about where it might be pointing to

 3. Travel to the real-world location you think the clue is describing

 4. Once at the location, press the "Found It!" button

 5. If you're in the right place (within about 30 meters), you'll see information about the location and can proceed to the next clue

 6. If you're not in the right place, keep exploring or use the hint for additional guidance

 7. Complete all clues to win the treasure hunt!

 8. Try to finish as quickly as possible - your time is being tracked

 9. You can use the "Get Current Location" button to update your position

 10. Have fun and enjoy exploring!
This treasure hunt app needs access to your location to verify when you\'ve found the correct places. Without location permissions, you won\'t be able to play the game.
